boardgame.description: Everyone meant to use the cabin only as a shelter for the night, but come the morning the door has been secured by a combination lock, with no one knowing the combination of numbers that will let them leave. The windows are barred as well. An enigmatic spinning code dial and a mysterious book is all that you have to go on. Can you escape from this abandoned cottage?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Exit: The Game _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; The Abandoned Cabin, players must use their team spirit, creativity, and powers of deduction to crack codes, solve puzzles, collect objects, and earn their freedom bit by bit._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

The Brands_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; take on escaping from a room as a co-operative board game. As you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d expect, there are puzzles to solve with time pressure to make this harder. This one has the players taking shelter overnight, only to find themselves imprisoned. The price shown is for UK/EU purchasers (and includes VAT). For purchasers outside the EU, the price is £10.00 (net of UK tax) - note that the purchaser is responsible for paying any duty or tax due on import to their country. I charge shipping at cost, as follows. UK addresses: £2.79 (myHermes, takes 2-3 working days, tracked) Other EU countries: £6.96 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Europe outside the EU: £5.80 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Australasia: £8.70 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) USA, Canada _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; elsewhere: £8.05 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked)
We only used pencil on the components which I have removed. The only permanent change is one page is folded and you may see a feint outline on a card or two. Shipping in the UK will be £4.13.

Notes ***PAYPAL ONLY!!!*** ***WILL POST TO UK ONLY!!!*** Used but in great condition, 95% perfect. When playing we tried to not damage anything. The ONLY thing that is any different from buying it new is that one page is folded (but isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t a big deal, is pretty obvious you need to do this) and you may see a feint outline on a card or two, but I added more feint lines so you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll still have to figure it out yourself anyway. Really enjoyed it, was great fun. :) NOTE: I am ALSO selling Exit The Pharaohs Tomb, if you buy both I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll only charge delivery once as I can send them together. :) Paypal only so we_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re both protected. Postage by Royal Mail - so shipping should be about £4.
